tool_description: Validates sensor readings against normal operating ranges and flags parameters that exceed safe thresholds.

sensor_readings.description: Array of current sensor reading values

sensor_types.description: Array of sensor type identifiers corresponding to readings

severity_level.description: Validation severity: strict, normal, or relaxed

engine_load.description: Current engine load percentage (0-100) for context-aware validation

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: sensor_readings and sensor_types arrays must have the same length.
Invalid sensor type: Unknown sensor type provided. Use standard automotive sensor codes.
Invalid threshold format: Custom thresholds must follow 'sensor_id:min:max' format with numeric values.
Invalid severity level: Use 'strict', 'normal', or 'relaxed' for severity_level.
Invalid engine load: engine_load must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide sensor_readings and corresponding sensor_types arrays. Optionally specify custom_thresholds, severity_level, and engine_load for more accurate validation.

validation_results.description: Boolean array indicating if each reading is within normal range

out_of_range_sensors.description: List of sensor IDs that have readings outside normal range

severity_flags.description: Severity level for each out-of-range reading: warning, critical, or severe

validation_summary.description: Overall validation status and summary message
